publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2811 Robin Harper: Spike Milligan 1918-2002-That the Parliament notes with sadness the death of Spike Milligan at the age of 83; recognises his extraordinary contribution to the development of satire, the extensive contribution he made in support of a large number of charities and campaigning organisations including Greenpeace, Friends of the Earth and the Society for the Preservation of Victorian Lamposts; further notes that he was fiercely against fox hunting, and conveys its sympathy to all of his family. R

S1M-2811 Robin Harper: Spike Milligan 1918-2002-That the Parliament notes with sadness the death of Spike Milligan at the age of 83; recognises his extraordinary contribution to the development of satire, the extensive contribution he made in support of a large number of charities and campaigning organisations including Greenpeace, Friends of the Earth and the Society for the Preservation of Victorian Lamposts; further notes that he was fiercely against fox hunting, and conveys its sympathy to all of his family. R
S1M-2811 Spike Milligan 1918-2002 (lodged on 28 February 2002) Michael Russell*, Trish Godman*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2811 Spike Milligan 1918-2002 (lodged on 28 February 2002) Brian Fitzpatrick*
